attributes.action: Start a proper advertising campaign (including TV Advertising) to promote Breastfeeding and its Health benefits to both mother and baby.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I often see TV adverts for "follow on" formula, but I have never seen an advert to promote breastfeeding.  Breastfeeding is the best way to feed a baby and its health benefits to mother and baby need to be promoted to encourage more mothers to try it,and to stop breastfeeding being such a taboo subject in this country.
